short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy to use bookmark manager. It includes functionalities to create chatGPT prompts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool lets you save collections of links and organize them in an easy way. It also adds functionalities save common prompts you can later use on chatGPT.
